title: Leaving Shadows
description: The Head of British Intelligence is kidnapped.A ransom demanded.A private security company is tasked with his recovery.But nothing is as it seems...Opposing forces clash with deadly consequences as they race to control the most devastating weapon of mass destruction devised by Man!Deceit and betrayal against a backdrop of real events in the new nail-biting suspense thriller from Eric J. Gates.
author: Eric J. Gates
